conclusion: Analyze the flow direction of the liquid as it passes through each baffle.
Baffle A: The liquid flows horizontally from left to right.
Baffle B: The liquid flows diagonally from top-left to bottom-right.
Baffle C: The liquid flows horizontally from left to right.
Baffle D: The liquid flows diagonally from top-right to bottom-left.
Baffle A: The liquid exits on the right side.
Baffle B: The liquid exits on the bottom-right corner.
Baffle C: The liquid exits on the right side.
Baffle D: The liquid exits on the bottom-left corner.
From Baffle A: The liquid will exit on the right side and flow into Container E.
From Baffle B: The liquid will exit on the bottom-right corner and flow into Container F.
From Baffle C: The liquid will exit on the right side and flow into Container E.
From Baffle D: The liquid will exit on the bottom-left corner and flow into Container F.
Liquid flowing from A and C will flow into Container E.
Liquid flowing from B and D will flow into Container F.
Final Answer: Liquid will flow into Container E from A and C, and into Container F from B and D.
